item.title: Biblioklept's Paradise (By Uncoolio)
item.description: Hitchiker’s guide to pirating books, research papers, and other textual fuckery - the guide to replace me Prologue Well fuckers, if you are reading this, it could only mean two things: 1] You need some text-based material 2] You are a broke cunt who cannot ejaculate a few bucks to satisfy your deepest desires If you are one of these, then this is the right place. Your Windows-loving, DRM-cucked, and chrome-using waste-of-human-flesh that you call a friend (or maybe it is you), might say “Nuh-uh, piracy bad, pay money and give capitalism a good fellatio”, but don’t listen to them.
